message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I really appreciate it. However, $110 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now.  How about $105?  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I can do $108, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Let me think for a moment...
